title: Cognitive Stimulation Activities
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want daily puzzles and quizzes tailored to my preferences so that I can engage my mind and enjoy cognitive activities without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Scheduled Reminders for Physical Activity Sessions
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want ALFRED to remind me to engage in physical activities so that I can maintain my independence and manage my health efficiently despite my mobility issues.

title: Progress Tracking and Feedback
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want to receive regular updates and encouragement messages regarding my health and activities so that I can stay motivated and feel supported in maintaining my independence and well-being.

title: Personalized Challenge Creation for Cognitive Engagement
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to select themes for cognitive challenges that align with my interests, so that I can stay mentally active and engaged without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Motivational Support - Goal-Setting Features with Celebratory Notifications
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want ALFRED to help me set achievable health and social goals and celebrate my progress with notifications so that I feel motivated to maintain my independence and stay connected with my family and friends.

title: Emergency Preparedness Training – Guided Scenarios for Emergency Response
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want guided scenarios for emergency response so that I can feel more prepared and confident in handling emergencies at home.

title: Daily Social Engagement Prompts
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to provide daily prompts for social engagement activities so that I can maintain my social connections and feel less isolated.

title: Guided Meditation for Relaxation
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want guided meditation sessions tailored to my preferences so that I can manage my stress and enhance my cognitive well-being in a simple and engaging way.
